113: Report! Houkai Creature’s reinforcement in the rear had been cut off temporarily! But their still kept coming! We can’t hold them for long, please give an order!
报告！后方崩坏生物的增援暂时被截断了！不过它们的增援并没有减少！我们抵抗不了多少时间，请求后续指示！
報告します！後方より迫る敵の増援を遮ることができました。しかし、崩壊生物の数は依然として減っておらず、突破されるのも時間の問題かと……指示をお願いします！！
보고합니다! 후방에서 접근하는 적의 증원을 차단했습니다. 하지만 붕괴 생물의 수는 여전히 줄어들지 않고, 돌파당하는 것도 시간 문제인 것 같습니다…… 지시를 부탁드립니다!!

Report! We were able to intercept the enemy reinforcements approaching from the rear. However, the number of Honkai Beasts is still not decreasing, and we think it is only a matter of time before they break through..... Please give us instructions!
Report! Reinforcements from the Avalanche creatures in the rear have been cut off for now! But their reinforcements haven't decreased! We can't resist for much longer, request follow-up instructions!

Report! We were able to intercept the enemy reinforcements approaching from the rear. However, the number of disintegrating organisms is still not decreasing, and we think it is only a matter of time before they break through. ...... Please give us instructions!
Seele! There are too many injuries in the battlefield. We must find a way for them to retreat back to the frontline!
希儿！战场上的伤员太多了，我们必须想办法让他们撤回前线！
ゼーレ！戦場の負傷者が多すぎる。何とかして前線から撤退させないと！
제레! 전장의 부상자가 너무 많아. 어떻게든 전선에서 철수시키지 않으면!
Seele! There's too many injured on the battlefield. We have to get them off the front lines!
Hill! There are too many wounded on the battlefield, we must find a way to get them back to the front!
Seele! There are too many wounded on the battlefield. We must do something to get them off the front lines!
The Houkai Creatures cut off our supply. Without supply, we can’t maintain the battle much longer...
崩坏生物截断了补给线，如果没有补给的话战线维持不了多久……
崩壊生物に補給線を断たれた。補給がないと戦線は長く持たないわ……。
붕괴 생물에게 보급선이 끊겼어. 보급이 없으면 전선은 오래 버틸 수 없어…….
The supply lines have been cut off by the Honkai beasts. The front lines aren't going to last much longer without them.
Avalanche creatures cut off the supply line, if there is no supply then the battle line can not be maintained for long ......
Supply lines were cut off by the disintegrating organisms. The front won't last long without supplies. ......
Gosh! Is this what Bronya had to face in every battle.
咕！姐姐大人在战斗中每次都面临着这么沉重的抉择么。
うう～……お姉ちゃんは戦闘中、いつもこんな重い決断を迫られてたのね。
우우~…… 언니는 전투 중에 항상 이런 무거운 결정을 강요당했던 거구나.
Man... So these are the kind of difficult decisions my sister had to make in every battle.
Goo! Does Sister-sama face such a heavy decision in battle every time.
Ugh~...... sister always had to make such heavy decisions in battle.
I must pull myself together! I must protect everyone when she is not with me!
不行！我要振作起来！姐姐大人不在的时候我一定要保护好大家！
だめだめ、元気出さなきゃ！お姉ちゃんがいない間、絶対みんなを守るんだから！
안 돼, 안 돼, 힘내야 해! 언니가 없는 동안, 절대 모두를 지킬 거야!
I've gotta pull myself together! I need to protect everyone while she's gone!
No! I have to pull myself together! I must protect everyone in the absence of Sister-sama!
No, no, no, you have to cheer up! I'm going to protect you while you're gone!
All teams, move towards the ME Corp. Cover the wounded troops and retreat inside ME Corp!
命令部队朝ME社方向转移，掩护伤员撤退到ME社内！
部隊はME社に向かって移動！負傷者を援護しつつME社内へ避難させて！
부대는 ME사로 이동! 부상자를 원호하면서 ME사 내로 피난시켜!
All troops, move towards ME Corp.! Cover the wounded, we'll reorganize inside the building!
Order the troops to move towards the ME Society and cover the retreat of the wounded into the ME Society!
Troops move toward ME Company! Evacuate the wounded to the ME company while covering the wounded!
Yssring! Take the engineering squad, cover your back with ME and build fortifications! We will stop the Houkai Creatures from there! If you find Bronya in the ME Corp, let her take the charge!
伊瑟琳！你先带着工程班以ME为后盾建立防御工事！我们要在那里迎击崩坏生物！如果在ME社中发现姐姐大人的话就把指挥权转交给姐姐大人！
イザーリンは、エンジニア班とともにME社を守る形で防御陣地を築いて。そこで崩壊生物を迎え撃つわ！もしME社内でお姉ちゃんを発見したら、その後はお姉ちゃんの指揮に従って。
이자린은 엔지니어 팀과 함께 ME사를 방어하는 형태로 진지를 구축할 거야. 여기서 붕괴 생물들을 맞서 싸울 거라고! 만약 ME사 안에서 언니를 발견한다면, 그 뒤로는 언니의 지휘에 따르도록 해.

Yiserin, direct the engineering squad and set up a defensive line outside the ME Corp. building. We'll intercept the Honkai Beasts there. If you find Bronya inside ME Corp., then follow her commands instead. (TN: I have no idea why she says outside ME corp? None of the three translations made sense, maybe they mistyped and meant inside?)

Estherine! You take the engineering squad first and set up fortifications with the ME as a backstop! We'll meet the Avalanche creatures there! If you find Sister-sama in the ME community, transfer the command to Sister-sama!

Estherine, together with the engineering team, will build a defensive position to protect the ME company. There we will intercept the disintegrating organisms! If you find your sister in the ME company, then follow her command.
We will move now, take care!
那我们先转移，你们小心！
じゃあ、先に移動するよ。そっちも気をつけろよ！
그럼 내가 먼저 이동할게. 너희들도 조심해!
Alright, let's move out! Be careful!
Then we move first, you guys be careful!
Okay, I'll move on. Be careful over there, too!
Don't worry, we'll be moving soon~
放心吧，我们马上也会转移的~
安心して、こちらもすぐに追っかけるから。
걱정 마, 우리도 금방 따라갈 테니까.
Don't worry, we'll be there right after you.
Don't worry, we'll move soon too~
Don't worry, we'll be right after you too.
Phew… We need to defend the frontline now. We must hold off Houkai Creatures’ attack and buy them some time!
呼…前线就靠我们了，在部队转移的过程中我们要抵挡住崩坏生物的进攻给她们创造时间！
ふぅ……前線は私たちが頼りよ。部隊が移動する間、崩壊生物の進攻を食い止めて時間を稼がなきゃ！
후... 전선은 우리가 책임져야 해. 부대가 이동하는 동안 붕괴 생물들의 진격을 막아내고 시간을 벌어야만 해!
Phew... The front lines are depending on us. We need to stall the Honkai beasts and buy some time while the troops are on the move!
Whew...the front line depends on us, in the process of moving the troops we have to hold off the attack of the collapsing creatures to create time for them!
Phew ...... we can count on us on the front lines. We need to stall the advance of the disintegrators and buy us some time while the troops are on the move!
我会和你一起并肩作战的！
ゼーレは私が守るから！

Hoho, I’m almost falling for you, but I only have Bronya in my heart~
嚯嚯，稍微有点迷上你了呢，可惜我的心里只有姐姐大人呢~
ふふ、ちょっと見惚れちゃった。でも、ゼーレの心はお姉ちゃんのものだけどね～。
흐흥, 잠시 넋을 잃을 뻔했네. 하지만 제레의 마음은 언니 것뿐이야~
Heheh, I'm almost falling for you. Unfortunately, my heart belongs only to my sister Bronya~
Ho ho ho, a little bit fascinated by you it, but unfortunately my heart is only sister-sama it ~
Phew, I'm a little smitten. But Seele's heart belongs to her sister, though~.

Well, you might have a chance if you can survive this. So don’t die, at least for me.
不过如果你能活下来的话，还是有一点机会的，所以就算是为了我也千万不要死哦。
生き残ろう。一緒に。絶対に死なせない。
살아남자. 함께. 절대 죽게 두지 않을 거야.
But if you can survive this, you might have a chance with me. So try not to die, alright?

Survive. Together. I won't let you die.

bg

msg
Phew~ Seems there’s less attack from Houkai Creatures now. I didn’t know we could hold them off for so long…
呼~崩坏生物的攻势似乎减弱了不少，没想到仅用这些兵力居然可以支持这么久……
ふぅ～、崩壊生物の攻勢もだいぶ弱まったみたい。この程度の戦力でここまでもつなんて思わなかったわ……。
후... 붕괴 생물들의 공세가 상당히 약해진 것 같아. 이 정도 전력으로 여기까지 버틸 줄은 몰랐는데......
Phew~ Looks like the attack from the Honkai Beasts has started to lighten up. I didn't think we'd be able to hold them off for this long...
Phew ~ the attack of the collapsing creatures seems to have weakened a lot, I didn't expect to be able to support so long with just these troops ......
Whew, it looks like the offensive of the disintegrating organisms has weakened considerably. I didn't think this level of force would last this long. ......
msg
Good work everyone! The main force had completed their relocation. Let’s get out of here when the next wave of attack is not here yet!
各位辛苦了！大部队基本已经转移完毕，乘着崩坏生物下一波攻势还没开始我们也赶紧撤退吧！
みんなご苦労さま！大部隊の移動はほぼ完了したわ。崩壊生物が次の攻勢に転じる前に、こちらも急いでME社内に移動しましょ！
다들 수고했어! 주력 부대 이동은 거의 끝났어. 붕괴 생물들이 다음 공격을 시작하기 전에 우리도 서둘러 ME사 안으로 이동하자!
Good work, everyone! Most of the troops have finished relocating. Let's hurry up and retreat into ME Corp.'s building before they begin attacking again!
Good work, everyone! The army has basically finished moving, take advantage of the fact that the next wave of collapse creatures have not yet begun to attack we also hurry to retreat!
Thanks for your hard work guys! We're almost done moving the bulk of the troops. Let's hurry up and move this one inside the ME before the disintegrating organisms launch their next offensive!

Report! We have received signal from the force retreated into ME Corp! They have been attacked by unknown mechanical weapons in the ME Corp!
报告！撤退至ME社的部队发来信号！遭到来自ME社中不明机甲兵器的攻击，目前正在交战中！
報告します！先にME社へ移動した大部隊からの緊急連絡です！ME社前で謎の機甲兵器の攻撃を受け、目下交戦中とのこと！
보고드립니다! 먼저 ME사로 이동한 주력 부대에서 긴급 연락이 왔습니다! ME사 정면에서 정체불명의 기갑 병기 공격을 받아 현재 교전 중이라는 보고입니다!
We've got an urgent report from the task force that was dispatched to the ME Corp. building! They're under attack by an unidentified mecha in front of the building and are now engaged in battle!
Report! Signal from troops retreating to the ME Society! We are being attacked by unidentified mechs from the ME community and are currently engaged in a battle!

I have a report! We have an urgent report from the large force that moved to the ME Company earlier! We are under attack by a mysterious armored weapon in front of the ME Company and are now engaged in a battle!

기갑 병기? 왜 그런 게!?
Armored mechas? How can that be?
Mechanical weapons? How can there be such a thing!
Armored weapons? How can there be such a thing?

Dammit! I don’t care! Let’s move to the ME Corp and meet the main force first!
可恶！管不了这么多了！立刻向ME社方向进发与大部队会合再说！
もう！次から次へと何なのよ！！直ちにME社に向かって前進！大部隊に急いで合流するわ！
정말! 계속해서 뭐가 이래!! 즉시 ME사로 전진! 대부대에 서둘러 합류할 거야!
Damn it! I just can't catch a break! Let's head to ME Corporation at once and join the troops as soon as possible!
Damn! I don't care anymore! Let's head towards ME Society and meet up with the army right away!
Oh my God! What is it, one after the other! Forward to ME Company at once! I'll join the battalion as soon as I can!

116: Whoa! What should I do, this isn’t the plan...
呜哇！该怎么办，这和说好的不一样啊……
うわわっ！どうしろっていうの、は、話が違うじゃない……。
우와! 어떻게 하라는 거야, 이, 이야기가 다르잖아…….
Woah! What should I do, this isn't part of the plan...
Woohoo! What to do, this is not what was promised ......
Wow! What do you want me to do? That's not what I'm talking about. ......
Hey! Yssring! You OO! Keep moving! Do you want to OO die here!
喂！伊瑟琳！你这个OO！别站着不动！你OO想死在这里么！
おい、イザーリンのバカ！何ぼさっと突っ立ってんだ、ここで死にたいのか！？
야, 이자린 이 바보! 뭐 하러 멍하니 서 있는 거야, 여기서 죽고 싶어!?
Hey! Yiserin! Don't just ☆☆ing stand there! Do you want to ☆☆ing die?!
Hey! Estherine! Don't stand still! Do you want to die here!
Hey, you Estherine fool! What are you just standing there like that, do you want to die here!
But… We are surrounded, we are going to die!
可是…前有狼后有虎，我们这次死定了啦！
でも……前門の虎、後門の狼じゃない、今度こそお終いよ！
하지만…… 앞문의 호랑이, 뒷문의 이리라니, 이번이야말로 끝이야!
But... There's monsters in front of us and killer machines behind us, we're done for! (TN: CN was a metaphor about wolves in front and tigers behind)
But... there are wolves in front and tigers behind, we are dead this time!
But ...... it's not tigers at the front gate and wolves at the back gate, this time it's over!
Move it! Don’t force me to knock you off and take you!
快走！不要逼我把你打晕了搬走！
行くぞ！つべこべ言ってると殴って黙らせるぞ！
간다! 잔소리하면 때려서 입 닫게 할 거야!
Move it! If you keep talking, I'm going to knock you out and carry you there!
Get out of here! Don't force me to knock you out and carry you away!
Let's go! If you keep talking, I'm gonna have to hit you to shut you up!
Seele! It’s so great to have you back!
希儿，你回来真是太好了！
ゼーレ、戻って来てくれて良かったぁ！
Seele! It's so great to have you back!
Hill, it's great to have you back!
Seele, good to have you back!
Seele! We have been attacked by the Mechanical weapons in ME Corp! Now the team is stuck at the entrance of ME Corp, we must find a way!
希儿！我们转移到ME社的时候忽然遭到里面机甲兵器的攻击！现在部队卡在了ME社入口进退两难，必须得想想办法！
ゼーレ！一体何なんだ！？ME社前に着いた途端、機甲兵器どもが攻撃を仕掛けてきやがった。引き連れてきた部隊は今ME社の入口で進退窮まってる。何とかしないと！
제레! 대체 무슨 일이야!? ME사 앞에 도착하자마자 기갑 병기 놈들이 공격을 해오고 있어. 데려온 부대는 지금 ME사 입구에서 발이 묶였어. 어떻게든 해결해야 해!
Seele! What the hell's going on? As soon as we made it to ME Corp., a bunch of armored mechas attacked us. Now the troops are stuck at the ME Corp.'s entrance! We have to do something!
Hill! When we moved to the ME community, we were suddenly attacked by the mechs inside! Now the troops are stuck at the entrance of the ME community, we have to do something!

Seele! What the hell is going on? As soon as we arrived in front of the ME company, the armored weapons attacked us. The unit I brought with me is now stuck at the entrance of the ME company. We have to do something!
How’s Bronya! Did you find her?
姐姐大人怎么样！有找到她么？
くっ……ねぇお姉ちゃんは！？見つかった？
Damn....! How's Bronya? Did you find her?
How's your sister? Did you find her?
Damn ...... hey sis! Did you find her?
I don't know, we didn't find her trail near the entrance...
不知道，我们在入口附近没有发现她的踪迹……
まだ……入口付近でそれらしき痕跡はなかった……。
아직... 입구 부근에서 그럴 듯한 흔적은 없었어...
There wasn't any trace of her near the entrance.....
I don't know, we found no sign of her near the entrance ......
There was still no trace of it near the ...... entrance .......
Ughh… Where did the Mechanical weapons come from! We have enough problems with the Houkai Creature already!
可恶…偏偏还有什么机甲兵器！明明崩坏生物已经够棘手的了！
そう……わかった。はぁ、こんな状況で機甲兵器だなんて。崩壊生物だけでも厄介なのにっ！
그래... 알겠어. 하아, 이런 상황에 기갑 병기라니. 붕괴 생물만 해도 골치 아픈데!
Ugh... Alright. I can't believe we have to deal with these mechas too, as if the Honkai Beasts weren't enough trouble!
Damn it...but there's still some mecha weapon! Avalanche creatures are already tricky enough!
So ...... I get it. Huh, I can't believe it's an armored weapon in this situation. The disintegrating organisms alone are nasty!
Looks like they were produced from the ME Corp factory. Didn’t expect them to operate after so many years…
这些机甲应该是ME社内的兵工厂生产出来的，没想到隔了这么多年这些兵器居然还能运作……
この機甲は、ME社内の兵器工場で製造されたものだと思う。これだけ長い年月が経ってるのにまだ動くなんて……。
이 기갑 병기는 ME사 내부의 병기 공장에서 제조된 것 같아. 이렇게 오랜 세월이 지났는데도 아직 움직이다니...
I believe these machines were manufactured inside a factory within ME Corp. I can't believe they're still functioning after all these years...
These mechs should be produced by the arsenal within the ME society, I never thought that after so many years these weapons would still be functioning ......
I believe this armor was manufactured in a weapons factory within ME. I can't believe it still works after all these years. ......
Whatever they are! We have no time to waste already!
不管它们是什么东西！我们已经没时间耽误了！
何だろうと構わないけど、後ろの崩壊生物に追いつかれたら戦線を維持できなくなるわ！
뭐든 상관없지만 뒤의 붕괴 생물들에게 쫓기면 전선을 유지할 수 없게 돼!
I don't care where they're from, we don't have time for explanations!
Whatever they are! We have no more time to delay!
I don't care what it is, but if the disintegrating creatures behind us catch up to us, we won't be able to hold the line!
Focus your fire and break through the gate! We must establish our defense in ME Corp. If we wait until the next wave of Houkai attack, we will die!
集中火力突破大门！我们要立刻在ME社内建立防线，如果等崩坏生物下一波攻击开始的话就必死无疑了！
火力を集中して入口を突破しましょう！急いでME社内に防御線を構築しないと。崩壊生物の次の攻撃が始まったら、絶体絶命よ！
화력을 집중해 입구를 돌파하자! 서둘러 ME사 내부에 방어선을 구축해야 해. 붕괴 생물의 다음 공격이 시작되면 완전히 궁지에 몰리게 될 거야!

Let's concentrate our firepower on breaking down the gate at the entrance. We need to hurry and build a line of defense inside the building. If the Honkai Beasts start their next attack, we're screwed!

Concentrate your firepower on breaking through the gate! We need to establish a defensive line inside the ME Society immediately, if we wait for the next wave of Avalanche creatures to start attacking we will be dead for sure!
Let's concentrate our firepower to breach the entrance! We need to hurry and build a line of defense inside ME. When the disintegrating organisms start their next attack, we're doomed!
Yssring! Ask the engineering squad to set up defense in front of the ME Corp entrance! I will send someone to protect you, build your defense with our front line, so you can save time!
伊瑟琳！让工程班在ME社入口前铺设防线！我会派人专门保护你们，让防线跟着战线推进，这样可以节省时间！
イザーリン、エンジニア班はME社の入口に防御線を築いて！こちらから援護要員を派遣するから、防御線を戦線に沿って進めていって。そうすれば手間も省けるわ。
이자린, 엔지니어 팀은 ME사 입구에 방어선을 구축해! 이쪽에서 지원 요원을 파견할 테니 방어선을 전선을 따라 전진시켜. 그럼 수고도 덜 수 있을 거야.

msg

On top of that, we don’t have enough info on the ME Corp’s Mechanical weapons. If we attack when things are unstable at the back, chances are we will be surrounded by attacks from both directions. Also...
另外，对于ME社的机甲兵器也没有足够的了解，如果在后方阵地不稳定的情况下盲目进攻的话，被前后夹击的可能性很高，另外……
それにME社の機甲兵器がいつ来るかも分からない。後方の陣地が不安定な状況でむやみに攻め込むと、前後で挟撃される可能性もある。それから——
게다가 ME사의 기갑 병기가 언제 나타날지 모르잖아. 후방 진지가 불안정한데 무작정 진격하면 앞뒤로 공격받을 수 있어. 그리고 ——

On top of that, we don't have enough intel on ME Corp.'s armored mechas. If we try launching an offensive against them while the defensive line behind us is still weak, we could be surrounded on both sides. In addition——

In addition, there is not enough understanding of the ME Society's mecha weaponry, and if you attack blindly in the case of unstable rear positions, the possibility of being caught back and forth is very high, in addition ......
Besides, there is no telling when the ME company's armored weapons will arrive. If we attack unnecessarily while our rear position is unstable, we may be pinched in the front and rear. And then--

Yiserin is right. We need to consolidate our defense, then investigate the surroundings. Safety is the first priority, we can’t put our family in danger anymore...
Estherine is right, we have to stabilize the position then investigate the surrounding area, we must ensure the safety of the troops, we can't put our families in danger again ......
You're right about Estherine. Let's stabilize the position first, then survey the perimeter. We need to make sure our troops are safe. Don't put your family in danger again. ......
msg
I suggest separating the troops into two teams. I will lead an assault deep in ME Corp and find ways to take down these Mechanical weapons.
我建议将部队分为两队，我负责突击队深入ME社调查，并找到解决这些机甲兵器的方法。
部隊を二手に分けましょう。私は突撃隊を率いてME社の奥に向かうわ。そこで、この機甲兵器を停止させる方法を探してみる。
부대를 둘로 나눌게. 내가 돌격대를 이끌고 ME사 심장부로 갈 테니 거기서 기갑 병기를 정지시킬 방법을 찾아보자.
Let's split up the troops. I'll lead an assault team deeper into the ME Corp. building and look for a way to stop these armored mechas.
I propose to divide the force into two teams, I will be in charge of the assault team to go deep into the ME society to investigate and find a solution to these mechatronic weapons.
Let's split up the troops. I'll lead the assault team to the back of the ME company. There, I will try to find a way to stop this armored weapon.

守備隊はそちらに任せるわ。引き続き防御陣地を強化して。進攻してくる崩壊生物は、ME社の防御線の外で食い止めて。絶対にME社を破壊させないように！

I'll leave the defensive line to you. Continue to fortify the defenses and hold off the advancing Honkai beasts outside. Don't let them destroy this building!
